shambler.name: Shambler
shambler.desc: A grotesque, reanimated husk. Slow and predictable, but its mutated flesh can absorb surprising amounts of punishment.

grey_soldier.name: Grey Soldier
grey_soldier.desc: A standard infantry unit of the Grey Collective. Agile and equipped with advanced energy weapons, they represent a common threat.

wurrie_blaster.name: Wurrie Scavenger
wurrie_blaster.desc: Small, swift, and cunning, Wurries often operate in packs, using their blaster pistols to harass larger targets before closing in.

space_lamprey.name: Space Lamprey
space_lamprey.desc: A terrifying land-dwelling parasite with rows of razor-sharp teeth. Extremely fast and relentless once it detects prey.

arakno.name: Arakno
arakno.desc: A cat-sized arachnid, known for its lightning-fast movements and a potent neurotoxin delivered through its elongated stinger. Highly aggressive.

turret_laser.name: Laser Turret
turret_laser.desc: A fixed-position automated defense system. Heavily armored and equipped with a high-calibre laser cannon, it's a formidable obstacle.

licker.name: Licker
licker.desc: A sessile ambush predator that clings to cavern ceilings. It uses powerful, adhesive tendrils to ensnare and paralyze any unwary prey.

shell.name: Shell
shell.desc: An alien with a thick, chitinous exoskeleton, providing innate resilience against energy-based attacks. Best engaged with kinetic or melee weapons.
